steps.title: How to Use
steps.subtitle: Simple four steps to easily convert between images and Base64

step1.title: Choose Direction
step1.description: Select 'Image to Base64' or 'Base64 to Image' based on your needs

step2.title: Upload or Paste
step2.description: Drag and drop image files or paste Base64 text directly

step3.title: One-Click Convert
step3.description: Click the convert button, system automatically processes and shows results

step4.title: Get Results
step4.description: Copy Base64 text or download the converted image

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to common questions during usage

q1.question: What is Base64 encoding?
q1.answer: Base64 is an encoding method that converts binary data to text, commonly used to transmit binary data like images in text protocols.

q2.question: Will the file size change after conversion?
q2.answer: Base64 encoding increases file size by about 33%, but allows direct embedding in HTML, CSS, or JSON.

q3.question: Which image formats are supported?
q3.answer: Supports all common image formats including JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, BMP, SVG, etc.

q4.question: Is there a file size limit?
q4.answer: To ensure good user experience, we recommend single files not exceed 100MB.

q5.question: How is data security ensured?
q5.answer: All conversion operations are completed locally in your browser, files are never uploaded to our servers, completely protecting your privacy.

q6.question: Can I convert files in batch?
q6.answer: Current version supports single file conversion, batch conversion feature is under development, stay tuned.
